name: Mutuelle Générale de l'Education Nationale
legal: Mutuelle régie par le code de la mutualité
membership: The MGEN group is a direct member of the Groupe VYV, la Mutualité Française (FNMF) and the International Cooperative and Mutual Insurance Federation (ICMIF)
goal:
With 4 million of insured persons, MGEN is a social protection major player. Created in 1947, the Mutual manages the health insurance compulsory scheme of professionals of National Education, Higher Education, Research, Culture and Communication, Youth and Sports.
MGEN also offers its members a wide range of complementary services in health, foresight, autonomy and retirement.MGEN also proposes an individual supplemental health insurance opened to all public, as well as collective health and welfare contracts for companies and associations. In total, more than € 3.2 billion in benefits were paid last year.
Global Health Actor, the Group has a diversified healthcare provision, through its 35 facilities, three mutual banks in the Paris region that it co-pilots in partnership and 2,500 care services and Mutual support it finances throughout the country.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Single market, Sport
euInitiatives:
Solvency II
Capital Markets Union
Fiscal issues
Insurance Contract Law
E-health initiative
Protection of personal data
Social economy and Social Business Initiative
Health care and welfare system
